system.sustained: The Psyker gains Unnatural Weapon Skill(X), Unnatural Ballistic Skill(X), and Unnatural Agility(X), where X is equal to their Psy Rating. Additionally, they may choose to vanish from reality for a total number of rounds (not neccisarily consecutive) up to the Degrees of Success on their Focus Power Test. When they reappear they do so in the same place they vanish.
